text: Hamber Provincial Park is a provincial park in British Columbia. It is next to Jasper National Park and the border with Alberta. It has an area of about . It is part of the Canadian Rocky Mountain Parks World Heritage Site. The Trans- Canada Highway was built a different way to make sure it didn't go through the park. ==Gallery== ==References== Category:Geography of British Columbia Category:Parks in British Columbia Category:Parks in the Canadian Rockies
title: Hamber Provincial Park
